snippet: Mayor Bill de Blasio said New York City was abandoning a lawsuit against the City Council to block a 2013 measure intended to curb profiling.
abstract: Mayor Bill de Blasio says his administration is abandoning lawsuit against New York City Council that would seek to block 2013 measure intended to curb police profiling; move by city's Law Department fulfills campaign promise by de Blasio and represents latest step by his administration to shake off its predecessor’s legacy of aggressively defending stop-and-frisk practices of Police Department.
lead_paragraph: Mayor Bill de Blasio said New York City was abandoning a lawsuit against the City Council to block a 2013 measure intended to curb profiling.

headline.main: De Blasio Drops Challenge to Law on Police Profiling
headline.print_headline: De Blasio Drops Challenge to Law on Police Profiling
